errors.error_description: Changed Python version requirement from 3.8 to 2.7, creating version compatibility error with deprecated Python version
correction_candidates: Mpmath requires Python 3.8 or later versions.  It has been tested with CPython 3.8 through 3.13 and for PyPy 3.9 through 3.10.
Mpmath requires Python 3.6 or later versions.  It has been tested with CPython 3.6 through 3.13 and for PyPy 3.9 through 3.10.
Mpmath requires Python 3.9 or later versions.  It has been tested with CPython 3.9 through 3.13 and for PyPy 3.9 through 3.10.
Mpmath requires Python 3.7 or later versions.  It has been tested with CPython 3.7 through 3.13 and for PyPy 3.9 through 3.10.
errors.golden_answer: Mpmath requires Python 3.8 or later versions.  It has been tested with CPython 3.8 through 3.13 and for PyPy 3.9 through 3.10.

errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependencies (numpy scipy) to the pip install command
